lines.text: Keep your thought as pure as the water.
Hey, this water ain't really that pure.
Un-heh, neither are you.
Yak loin. Good to keep the Yang up.
She's over 300 years old.
How do you manage something like that?
One of her ancestors was raped by a dragon.
Does that happen a lot where you come from?
Only a man whose heart is pure can wield the knife, and only a man whose ass is narrow can get down these steps. And if mine's is such an ass, then I shall have it.
We'll be there soon.
Yeah, well, ya' better have a spatula where we're goin' cause my ass is frozen to this yak.
Hey Bird - Did you just see a little Hare-Krishna midget in the tree, floatin'?... Or is it me?
[the phone rings]
It must be Rod Serling.
You've no idea who I am, have you?
Yes. You're Sardo Numsie. Ha-ha-ha. Look, I don't care who you are. I do care that you kidnapped a little kid, though.
I could destroy you...
[Snaps fingers]
... just like that.
We wouldn't want that. Listen, bring me the boy, and I'll give you the knife. And then no one will have to be destroyed...
[Snaps fingers]
... jus' like that.
Tell me about the Golden Child.
Every thousand generations, a perfect child is born, a Golden Child. He has come to rescue us.
Rescue us from what?
From ourselves.
Ah.
He is the bringer of compassion. If he dies, compassion will die with him.
So, if something happens to the kid, the whole world goes to hell?
The world will become hell.
So, I gotta go to Tibet, because I'm the Chosen One. Why can't anybody choose me to go to the Bahamas?
[to the Golden Child]

Hey, that's a neat trick you do, where somebody throws a rock at you and you wave your hand and make it hit something else. Did you ever hear of Ed McMahon and "Star Search"? Do they have "Star Search" in Tibet? Probably not. Probably got "Food Search." But you know what we could do, is we could all go on "Star Search" and we could give the audience rocks, and have them throw them at you, and then you can wave your hand and make them all hit Ed McMahon - hard.
[laughs]
Gompa, I have ruined myself with the American. He is a fool.
But he's brave.
He is irresponsible.
But he's generous.
He thinks of nothing but protecting his own feelings.
But if you touch his heart, there's nothing he wouldn't do for you.
He believes in nothing.
Yet, still he does what is right.
He is a callous, thoughtless, undisciplined fool.

[chuckles]
Yes. I, too, like him very much. It's very hard not to.
I dont know, maybe he cut himself shaving and bled to death looking for a kleenex.
So, you're just gonna let that booger freeze up on your jacket like that?
So, tell me about this dream.
Some part's real, some part's dream.
So this scar on my arm's real.
Right.
What about Numsie?
Numspaa, Sardo Numspaa.
Yeah.
He's very real.
You know, you were there, and you said some things that seemed pretty real...
That part was dream!
I was just checking.

[after shielding Chandler from Sardo's arrow, Kee confesses why she stayed with him before she dies]
I didn't spend... the night with you to obligate you. I spent the night with you... because I love you.
I know this is a dream, so I can say anything I want and get away with it. So I think I will say, from my heart, kiss my ass. Kiss my ass!
[Chandler puckers up]
[Chandler sees a man reading a porno magazine]
'Butt Pie' is a sequel to the bestseller 'Butt Cake.' A whole magazine of butt with cake all over it.
[Reads the magazine title]
'Chunky Asses?'
[laughs]
Do you have any other questions?
Well, yes, I do. What are you doing next week? Because your silhouette is kickin!
I have been wanting to meet you, Mr. Yarrell.
[Indescribable Tibetan language]
Get your 'monkey' off my back.
Of course. Fu, please retire.
Yeah, Fu. Save it.
My dear, sweet brother Numsie!
They're not gonna let me on the plane with this 2 foot knife.
Yes they will.
No they won't. I'm going to jail.
Ha! I got the knife! Now turn on the goddamn lights!
